Name: Wheat
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food.

Name: Rice
Effect: Every 4 spins: +10 Food.

Name: Cattle
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +2 Food per adjacent Cattle.

Name: Banana
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. Destroyed after 6 spins.

Name: Fish
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +3 Food if adjacent to Coast.

Name: Coast
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +1 Gold per adjacent Coast.

Name: Stone
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food, +1 Gold.

Name: Copper
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. If exactly 3 Copper on the board: all Copper produce ×3.

Name: Granary
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Adjacent Wheat and Rice produce double.

Name: Monument
Effect: Every spin: +2 Knowledge. +1 Food per adjacent symbol.

Name: Warrior
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. Destroys adjacent Barbarian. +8 Food per Barbarian destroyed.

Name: Barbarian
Effect: Every spin: -3 Food. Every 12 spins: adds another Barbarian to the board. Cannot be destroyed except by combat symbols.

Name: Scout
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food, +1 Knowledge. Every 8 spins: adds a random Era 1 symbol to your collection.

Name: Settler
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. After 12 spins: destroyed and replaced by City.

Name: Palace
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food, +1 Gold. +1 Food per City on the board.

Name: Shrine
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food, +1 Knowledge. +2 Food if adjacent to any Religion symbol.

Name: Plantation
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. If adjacent to Banana: +4 Food and Banana's destroy timer resets.

Name: Pasture
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. Adjacent Cattle and Horse produce +2 extra Food.

Name: Quarry
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. If adjacent to Stone: +3 Gold. If adjacent to Copper: +2 Gold.

Name: Totem
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food per Religion symbol anywhere on the board.

Name: Offering
Effect: Every spin: sacrifice 5 Food → +4 Knowledge. If you can't pay: does nothing.

Name: Omen
Effect: Every spin: 50% chance +6 Food, 50% chance -2 Food.

Name: Campfire
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Destroyed after 10 spins. All symbols that were ever adjacent gain permanent +1 Food.

Name: Pottery
Effect: Every spin: stores +2 Food internally (shown on counter). On destroy: releases stored Food ×2.

Name: Hunting Ground
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. If adjacent to Forest: +3 Food. Destroys adjacent Deer and gains +6 Food per Deer.

Name: Forest
Effect: +1 Food. On destroy: +20 Food.

Name: Deer
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Every 10 spins: adds another Deer to a random empty slot on the board.

Name: Oasis
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. +2 Food per adjacent empty slot.

Name: Flood Plain
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. 20% chance each spin: adjacent symbols produce double this spin.

Name: Tribal Village
Effect: On appear: immediately adds 2 random Era 1 symbols to your collection. Then destroys self.

Name: Horse
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +1 Gold. If adjacent to Pasture: +4 Food extra.

Name: Iron
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +2 Gold. If adjacent to Warrior: Warrior is upgraded to Swordsman.

Name: Swordsman
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Destroys adjacent Barbarian. +12 Food per Barbarian destroyed. Attacks twice.

Name: Galley
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. +2 Food per adjacent Coast. Every 8 spins: adds a random symbol from any unlocked Era.

Name: Library
Effect: Every spin: +3 Knowledge. +2 Knowledge if adjacent to Scroll.

Name: Scroll
Effect: Every spin: +2 Knowledge. +1 Knowledge per adjacent symbol that produces Knowledge.

Name: Market
Effect: Every spin: +1 Gold per adjacent symbol. Every 5 spins: converts 8 Gold into a random Era 2 symbol added to collection.

Name: Tax Collector
Effect: Every spin: +3 Gold. Adjacent symbols produce -1 Food this spin.

Name: Merchant
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. +1 Gold per unique resource-producing symbol type adjacent (Food, Gold, Knowledge count separately).

Name: Vineyard
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +2 Gold. Every 6 spins: produces a Wine symbol on the board. Wine gives +5 Gold then destroys self.

Name: Oracle
Effect: Every spin: +2 Knowledge. Reveals the next symbol choices before spinning. Pay 3 Gold to replace one choice.

Name: Colosseum
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. If adjacent to Warrior or Swordsman: +4 Food extra. -2 Food per adjacent empty slot.

Name: Aqueduct
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Adjacent food-producing symbols produce +2 extra Food.

Name: Forge
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +1 Gold. If adjacent to Copper or Iron: +4 Gold. If adjacent to Stone: +2 Food.

Name: Great Wall
Effect: Every spin: +4 Food, +2 Knowledge. Prevents all symbols in the same row from being destroyed.

Name: Caravan
Effect: Every spin: +1 Gold per symbol on the entire board that produces Gold.

Name: Pantheon
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +2 Knowledge. If you have no Religion symbol on the board: +5 Food extra.

Name: Harbor
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. Every 6 spins: adds a random symbol from any unlocked Era to your collection.

Name: Siege Tower
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. If adjacent to a symbol that produces 0 or negative Food: destroys it and gives +15 Food.

Name: Arena
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Whenever any symbol is destroyed this spin: +4 Food, +2 Gold.
